Madison.Hilldale Shopping Center: Hilldale Shopping Center, known locally as Hilldale, is a partially enclosed shopping mall/lifestyle center development on the west side of Madison, Wisconsin. Originally opened in October 1962, Hilldale has four anchor stores, Macy's, Target, Metcalfe's Market, and the Sundance 608 movie theaters, as well as over 50 specialty stores as of May 2011. The mall has struck controversy among locals for being too congested and overdeveloped.
